TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed FilenameProperty extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Identifies the names of the image files that are used to draw a visual style element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The FilenameProperty enumeration represents the names of image files that are used to draw visual style elements. The FilenameProperty values are used as an argument in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer.GetFilename%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to specify which file name property to retrieve for the element that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer> currently represents.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.FilenameProperty GlyphImageFile = int32(3008)

Docs.summary: The name of the glyph image file.

Docs.summary: The name of the first multiple-image file.

Docs.summary: The name of the second multiple-image file.
